website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch motorcycle battery constructed with lead calcium alloy and absorbed glass mat technology.
pros: Can be mounted in any arrangement for added convenience
Fiberglass mat separators and high cell compression help extend the motorcycle battery's lifespan
cons: Terminals won't line up properly with many popular motorcycles

customer_reviews.title: Battery life about a year, but okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: This battery fit perfectly in my Yamaha XT250. I charged it at least every month, in addition to riding regularly. After just over a year the battery started to get weak, having trouble cranking the bike unless I had already been riding it for a while. For the price, I'll take that kind of battery life. I will buy another one soon to replace it. Now I know what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Graybush

customer_reviews.title: over the past 2 years and all are working great! I take them out for the winter and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third one of these bought for various apps, CB radio station, Scooter, outboard motor. over the past 2 years and all are working great! I take them out for the winter and they sit all winter, through them on the charger and off we go. they in fact hold there charge all winter. very powerful for there size. no problem starting a 15hp motor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hodesson

customer_reviews.title: WARNING Battery Leak
customer_reviews.text: Chrome Battery was recommended to my by a friend. Unfortunately, my battery leaked, which drained through the drain hole in the batter tray onto my swing arm and shock stripping the anodization off my CBR. I have contacted Chrome Battery and we will see what they do to fix this but I don't have high hopes that they are going to replace my swing arm for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Rohler

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Hardware
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if the battery came with the hardware like nuts, bolts, and washers ... its the simple things that make the difference ... now I have to go and figure out what size, etc. to get, and pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tuch

customer_reviews.title: Great batteryfor the price.
customer_reviews.text: Battery works fine. Right size and fit. The reason I don't give it 5 stars is that I ordered the POS. Left and it came reversed. Not a problem though I just installed it reversed on my generator.
customer_reviews.author: Jfixit

customer_reviews.title: worked!
customer_reviews.text: great price and it worked perfect ! used on 15 yamaha r1
customer_reviews.author: rubi

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It works like it should. It was a little hard to install. there is nothing that will hold the nut in place
customer_reviews.author: Thirteen

customer_reviews.title: Terminals didn’t lineup But I made it
customer_reviews.text: Terminals didn’t lineup But I made it work. Said that it would fit but I have to improvise
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Check your cranking amps.
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertise as a replacement for my atv battery and it doesnt seem to have the crancking amps needed to start it. I always have to jump itto get it going even though it has enough charge.
customer_reviews.author: Juan r.

customer_reviews.title: So far, most excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Can't vouch for the service life yet, but this battery fits perfectly, was a fantastic price ($24 FS), and starts my Honda Ruckus before you even hear it crank over. I'm a very happy customer so far.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Factory OEM fit and style.  Starts my Yamaha WR250R right away.
customer_reviews.text: Factory OEM fit and style. Came filled and sealed with battery acid. This battery started my cycle up right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Repko

customer_reviews.title: Brand new - Fast Prime shipping
customer_reviews.text: Installed this new battery and my bike fired right up! Thanks Chrome Battery!
customer_reviews.author: J Straum

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's only been here for four days but so far it's great. Came charged, bolted right up and starts my bike every time. My only gripe is the screws were a touch short so it was hard to get them started with the wire attached.
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This battery is wonderfully tiny for my bobber project and turns over my Suzuki Savage perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Benner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Last much longer than my previous one. Sitting over 2 weeks and start my bike right up.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything as i expect.Now will see how long that battery last
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Lessard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The battery arrived damaged (see picture). The bolt cannot be fixed in the terminal. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis ANDRES

customer_reviews.title: Very fast shipping! The item Too small, but it came with the bolts and washers
customer_reviews.text: Very small, it would fit and start the motorcycle no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying something better.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap battery. Get what you pay for. Doesn't turn my 450er over fast. Will be buying something better.
customer_reviews.author: amonzo

customer_reviews.title: The delivery was very quick but the battery terminal for ...
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was very quick but the battery terminal for the negative side was crushed and I had to do a lot of bending and forming in order to get the nut inside so that I could screw the wire to the terminal. This was very frustrating and time consuming in 15 degree temperatures. After about 45 minutes my son was up and riding his ATV. Would purchase again but I would return damaged goods.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

product_meta.title: Rechargeable - Replacement YTZ7S High Performance Power Sports Battery - Chrome Battery
feature_bullets: Powersport Battery: YTZ7S battery is durable, vibration resistant, and performance ready to handle even the roughest rides. This battery is 4.45" L x 2.76" W x 4.38" H in, 4.58 lbs, and has 180 CCA

Factory Sealed: A non-spillable rechargeable battery constructed with absorbed glass mat (AGM) technology and permanently factory sealed enabling it to be mounted in any position leak free along with allowing it to be repeatedly charged and discharged without affecting performance
Easy Application: Chrome Battery batteries come fully charged and ready to go once delivered. Simply connect your battery to the application and you are ready to go
Customer Service: Top notch customer service from real battery experts! Guaranteed 18-month warranty with 60 day refund policy
Replaces: YTX7S-BS, CTZ7S-BS, 7S-BS, PTZ7S, ETZ7S, ATZ-7-RS, FAYTZ7S
